attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish to bring to the attention of "Part 8 Anti-Social Behaviour Act 2003"
Under this part of The Act,NO action can be taken to have hedges reduced in height if the hedge as a chance of dying. Surely this is not right if these hedges block out light to peoples homes.
I would like to see common sense prevail on this issue, where the maximum height for these hedges is set at 2 metres,even less if the hedge blocks light to any room

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
